text: The men's pole vault event at the 2003 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Bydgoszcz, Poland, at Zawisza Stadion on 18 and 20 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Oleksandr Korchmid ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Marvin Osei-Tutu ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Maksym Mazuryk ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 20 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !rowspan=2|Rank !!rowspan=2| Name !!rowspan=2| Nationality !!colspan=7|Attempts !!rowspan=2| Result !!rowspan=2| Notes |- ! 5.00 !! 5.15 !! 5.30 !! 5.40 !! 5.45 !! 5.50 !! 5.55 |- | || align=left | Oleksandr Korchmid || align=left | || – || – || xo || o || o || o || xxx || 5.50 || |- | || align=left | Marvin Osei-Tutu || align=left | || – || – || xo || xxo || – || o || xxx || 5.50 || |- | || align=left | Maksym Mazuryk || align=left | || – || o || o || xxo || o || – || xxx || 5.45 || |- | 4 || align=left | Giorgio Piantella || align=left | || xo || o || o || xxx || || || || 5.30 || |- | 5 || align=left | Mark Beharrell || align=left | || xxo || xxo || xo || xxx || || || || 5.30 || |- | 6 || align=left | Kevin Rans || align=left | || – || xo || xxx || || || || || 5.15 || |- | 7 || align=left | Paweł Szczyrba || align=left | || xxo || xxx || || || || || || 5.00 || |- | || align=left | Matti Mononen || align=left | || – || – || xxx || || || || || NM || |- | || align=left | Filippos Sgouros || align=left | || – || xxx || || || || || || NM || |- | || align=left | Stavros Kouroupakis || align=left | || – || – || – || xxx || || || || NM || |- | || align=left | Dmitriy Kuptsov || align=left | || – || – || xxx || || || || || NM || |- | || align=left | Alberto Martínez || align=left | || || || || || || || || DNS || |} ===Qualifications=== 18 July Qualifying 5.40 or 12 best to the Final ====Group A==== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
